metadata.description:
This is an example package file for the soundsgoodman repository. It installs a ReaScript that prints "Hello World!" in REAPER's scripting console.

reapack.name: Sruthin1234_Add meta Marker and rename smart from ucsify SGM .lua
reapack.desc: Add meta marker and rename (UCIFY) - SGM

metadata.description: Adds a meta marker and performs smart renaming based on UCIFY logic.
Injects metadata fields into SGM according to UCIFY conventions.

ReaPack index for the soundsgoodman repository.
Contains scripts under Example and UCIFY categories: - Example/Hello world.lua - UCIFY/Add meta Marker and rename smart from ucsify SGM .lua - UCIFY/Inject metaddata fileds SGM .lua
